arStrings.szText: Gain {c_number}{SF_9}{/c} Energy when {c_important}Puncture{/c} damages a Crowd Controlled enemy.

{c_important}Puncture{/c} now throws {c_number}3{/c} blades in a spread, each dealing {c_number}[{SF_21} * 100|%|]{/c} of its Base damage. Hitting an enemy with at least {c_number}2{/c} blades at once makes them {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} for {c_number}{SF_18}{/c} seconds.
Every {c_number}{SF_20}rd{/c} cast of {c_important}Puncture{/c} will also ricochet up to {c_number}2{/c} times. Critical Strikes will always ricochet.
